site.description:
ModelicaML is a UML Profile for modeling and simulating of the system dynamic behavior. It enables engineers to formalize system requirements and designs, to simulate designs and to verify desings againts requirements.
The Eclipse plugins provided by this update site are add-ons to the Papyrus (MDT) UML modeling tool. They customize Papyrus with ModelicaML modeling features, provide a Modelica code generator and a connection to the OpenModelica compiler.

category-def.name: org.openmodelica.modelicaml
category-def.label: ModelicaML - A UML Profile for System Dynamics Engineering using Modelica
category-def.description:
ModelicaML is a UML Profile for modeling and simulating of the dynamic system behavior. It enables engineers to formalize system requirements and designs, to simulate the created models and to perform the verification of designs againts requirements.
The Eclipse plugins provided by this update site are add-ons to the Papyrus (MDT) UML modeling tool. They customize Papyrus with ModelicaML modeling features, provide a Modelica code generator and a connection to the OpenModelica compiler.
